duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, validate, and release parts (hoods/fenders, side doors, tailgates, liftgates, and roof systems) for assigned programs.
Implement design improvements to increase quality and cost/weight optimization.
Comply with Corporate and Local Requirements for parts validation, considering Worldwide Customers Requirements, Engineering Specifications, and Systems Design specifications.
Maintain Standard Operating Procedures for Engineering.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or a related field (Master's preferred)
